effect:
If the user [faints]{mechanic} before its next move, the Pokémon that [faint]{mechanic}ed it will automatically [faint]{mechanic}.  End-of-turn damage is ignored.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power varies inversely with the user's proportional remaining [HP]{mechanic}.

64 * current HP / max HP | Power
-----------------------: | ----:
 0– 1                    |  200
 2– 5                    |  150
 6–12                    |  100
13–21                    |   80
22–42                    |   40
43–64                    |   20

short_effect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.
effect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the [field]{mechanic}, if it tried to use a move this turn and [failed]{mechanic}, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

short_effect: Cannot lower the target's HP below 1.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Will not reduce the target's [HP]{mechanic} below 1.

short_effect: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
effect: Removes [major status effects]{mechanic} and [confusion]{mechanic} from every Pokémon in the user's party.

short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Hits three times in the same turn.  The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power.  Each hit has a separate [accuracy]{mechanic} check, and this move stops if a hit misses.

[Skill Link]{ability} does not apply.

short_effect: Takes the target's item.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with [Sticky Hold]{ability} or [Multitype]{ability} are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with [Recycle]{move}.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
effect:
The target cannot [switch out]{mechanic} normally.  Ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.

The target may still escape by using [Baton Pass]{move}, [U-turn]{move}, or a [Shed Shell]{item}.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it's asleep.
effect: Only works on [sleep]{mechanic}ing Pokémon.  Gives the target a nightmare, damaging it for 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic} every turn.  If the target wakes up or leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

short_effect: Raises the user's evasion.
effect:
Raises the user's [evasion]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

[Stomp]{move} has double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.
effect:
If the user is a [Ghost]{type}: user pays half its max [HP]{mechanic} to place a curse on the target, damaging it for 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic} every turn.
Otherwise: Lowers the user's [Speed]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}, and raises its [Attack]{mechanic} and [Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

The curse effect is passed on by [Baton Pass]{move}.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used [Detect]{move}, [Endure]{move}, [fast guard]{move}, [Protect]{move}, or [wide guard]{move} on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

[Lock-On]{move}, [Mind Reader]{move}, and [No Guard]{ability} provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves ([Fissure]{move}, [Guillotine]{move}, [Horn Drill]{move}, and [Sheer Cold]{move}); those are always blocked by this move.

[Thunder]{move} during [Rain Dance]{move} and [Blizzard]{move} during [Hail]{move} have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* [Acupressure]{move} from an ally
* [Curse]{move}'s curse effect
* Delayed damage from [Doom Desire]{move} and [Future Sight]{move}; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* [Feint]{move}, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* [Imprison]{move}
* [Perish Song]{move}
* [Shadow Force]{move}
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as [Transform]{move} or [Psych Up]{move}

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Scatters Spikes, hurting opposing Pokémon that switch in.
effect:
Scatters spikes around the opposing [field]{mechanic}, which damage opposing Pokémon that enter the [field]{mechanic} for 1/8 of their max [HP]{mechanic}.  Pokémon immune to [Ground]{type} moves are immune to this damage, except during [Gravity]{move}.  Up to three layers of spikes may be laid down, adding 1/16 to the damage done: two layers of spikes damage for 3/16 max [HP]{mechanic}, and three layers damage for 1/4 max [HP]{mechanic}.

[Wonder Guard]{ability} does not block damage from this effect.

[Rapid Spin]{move} removes this effect from its user's side of the [field]{mechanic}.  [Defog]{move} removes this effect from its target's side of the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it's a Ghost.
effect: Resets the target's [evasion]{mechanic} to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the [field]{mechanic}.  A [Ghost]{type} under this effect takes normal damage from [Normal]{type} and [Fighting]{type} moves.  This move itself ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.

short_effect: User and target both faint after three turns.
effect:
Every Pokémon is given a counter that starts at 3 and decreases by 1 at the end of every turn, including this one.  When a Pokémon's counter reaches zero, that Pokémon [faint]{mechanic}s.  A Pokémon that leaves the [field]{mechanic} will lose its counter; its replacement does not inherit the effect, and other Pokémon's counters remain.

This effect is passed on by [Baton Pass]{move}.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.
effect:
Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.  Pokémon that are not [Ground]{type}, [Rock]{type}, or [Steel]{type} take 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of every turn.  Every [Rock]{type} Pokémon's original [Special Defense]{mechanic} is raised by 50% for the duration of this effect.

[SolarBeam]{move}'s power is halved.

[Moonlight]{move}, [Morning Sun]{move}, and [Synthesis]{move} only heal 1/4 the user's max [HP]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.
effect:
The user's [HP]{mechanic} cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn.

If the user successfully used [Detect]{move}, [Endure]{move}, [fast guard]{move}, [Protect]{move}, or [wide guard]{move} on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User is forced to use this move for five turns.  Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends.  If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends.

If the user has used [Defense Curl]{move} since entering the field, this move has double power.

short_effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.
effect: Raises the target's [Attack]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}, then [confuses]{mechanic} it.  If the target's [Attack]{mechanic} cannot be [raised]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}, the [confusion]{mechanic} is not applied.

short_effect: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power doubles after every time this move is used, whether consecutively or not, maxing out at 16x.  If this move misses or the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}, power resets.

short_effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.
effect: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pokémon leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

short_effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power increases with [happiness]{mechanic}, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect: Randomly inflicts damage with power from 40 to 120 or heals the target for 1/4 its max HP.
effect:
Randomly uses one of the following effects.

Effect                                             | Chance
-------------------------------------------------- | -----:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic} with 40 power  |    40%
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic} with 80 power  |    30%
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic} with 120 power |    10%
Heals the target for 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic}    |    20%

On average, this move inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic} with 52 power and heals the target for 1/20 its max [HP]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power increases inversely with [happiness]{mechanic}, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect: Protects the user's field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.
effect:
Protects Pokémon on the user's side of the [field]{mechanic} from [major status]{mechanic} effects and [confusion]{mechanic} for five turns.  Does not cancel existing ailments.  This effect remains even if the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.

If [Yawn]{move} is used while this move is in effect, it will immediately fail.

[Defog]{move} used by an opponent will end this effect.

This effect does not prevent the [confusion]{mechanic} caused by [Outrage]{move}, [Petal Dance]{move}, or [Thrash]{move}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [burn]{mechanic} the target.  [Frozen]{mechanic} Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect: Power varies randomly from 10 to 150.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power is selected at random between 10 and 150, with an average of 64:

Magnitude | Power | Chance
--------: | ----: | -----:
        4 |    10 |     5%
        5 |    30 |    10%
        6 |    50 |    20%
        7 |    70 |    20%
        8 |    90 |    20%
        9 |   110 |    10%
       10 |   150 |     5%

This move has double power against Pokémon currently underground due to [Dig]{move}.

short_effect: Allows the trainer to switch out the user and pass effects along to its replacement.
If the target leaves battle this turn, user will hit the target with double power and then hit its replacement normally.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target attempts to [switch out]{mechanic} this turn before the user moves, and the user is not prevented from doing so, the user will hit the target with doubled power as it leaves.  Otherwise, this move does not act specially.

This effect can still hit a Pokémon that [switches out]{mechanic} when it has a [Substitute]{move} up or when an ally has used [Follow Me]{move}.

short_effect: Frees the user from binding moves, removes Leech Seed, and blows away Spikes.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Removes [Leech Seed]{move} from the user, frees the user from [Bind]{move}, [Clamp]{move}, [Fire Spin]{move}, [Magma Storm]{move}, [Sand Tomb]{move}, [Whirlpool]{move}, and [Wrap]{move}, and clears [Spikes]{move}, [Stealth Rock]{move}, and [Toxic Spikes]{move} from the user's side of the [field]{mechanic}.  If this move misses or has [no effect]{mechanic}, its effect doesn't activate.

short_effect: Inflicts 20 points of damage.
effect: Inflicts exactly 20 damage.

short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.
effect:
Heals the user for half its max [HP]{mechanic}.

During [Sunny Day]{move}, the healing is increased to 2/3 max [HP]{mechanic}.

During [Hail]{move}, [Rain Dance]{move}, or [Sandstorm]{move}, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max [HP]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.
Changes the weather to rain for five turns.
effect:
Changes the weather to rain for five turns, during which [Water]{type} moves inflict 50% extra damage, and [Fire]{type} moves inflict half damage.

If the user is holding [Damp Rock]{item}, this effect lasts for eight turns.

[Thunder]{move} has 100% accuracy.  If the target has used [Detect]{move} or [Protect]{move}, [Thunder]{move} has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

[SolarBeam]{move} has half power.

[Moonlight]{move}, [Morning Sun]{move}, and [Synthesis]{move} heal only 1/4 of the user's max [HP]{mechanic}.

Pokémon with [Swift Swim]{ability} have doubled original [Speed]{mechanic}.

Pokémon with [Forecast]{ability} become [Water]{type}.

Pokémon with [Dry Skin]{ability} heal 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic}, Pokémon with [Hydration]{ability} are cured of [major status effects]{mechanic}, and Pokémon with [Rain Dish]{ability} heal 1/16 max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of each turn.

short_effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.
effect:
Changes the weather to sunshine for five turns, during which [Fire]{type} moves inflict 50% extra damage, and [Water]{type} moves inflict half damage.

If the user is holding [Heat Rock]{item}, this effect lasts for eight turns.

Pokémon cannot become [frozen]{mechanic}.

[Thunder]{move} has 50% accuracy.

[SolarBeam]{move} skips its charge turn.

[Moonlight]{move}, [Morning Sun]{move}, and [Synthesis]{move} heal 2/3 of the user's max [HP]{mechanic}.

Pokémon with [Chlorophyll]{ability} have doubled original [Speed]{mechanic}.

Pokémon with [Forecast]{ability} become [Fire]{type}.

Pokémon with [Leaf Guard]{ability} are not affected by [major status effects]{mechanic}.

Pokémon with [Flower Gift]{ability} change form; every Pokémon on their side of the [field]{mechanic} have their original [Attack]{mechanic} and [Special Attack]{mechanic} increased by 50%.

Pokémon with [Dry Skin]{ability} lose 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of each turn.

Pokémon with [Solar Power]{ability} have their original [Special Attack]{mechanic} raised by 50% but lose 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of each turn.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's [Defense]{mechanic} one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's [Attack]{mechanic} one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.
effect: User pays half its max [HP]{mechanic} to raise its [Attack]{mechanic} to +6 [stages]{mechanic:stage}.  If the user cannot pay the [HP]{mechanic} cost, this move will fail.

short_effect: Discards the user's stat changes and copies the target's.
effect:
Discards the user's [stat changes]{mechanic} and copies the target's.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last special hit it took.
effect:
Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a [special]{mechanic} move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will [fail]{mechanic}.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Raises the user's [Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.  User then charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Has chance to make the target flinch.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make each target [flinch]{mechanic}.

If the target is under the effect of [Bounce]{move}, [Fly]{move}, or [freefall]{move}, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.

If the target is in the first turn of [Dig]{move}, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect: Hits the target two turns later.
effect:
Inflicts [typeless]{mechanic} [regular damage]{mechanic} at the end of the third turn, starting with this one.  This move cannot score a [critical hit]{mechanic}.  If the target [switches out]{mechanic}, its replacement will be hit instead.  Damage is calculated at the time this move is used; [stat changes]{mechanic} and [switching out]{mechanic} during the delay won't change the damage inflicted.  No move with this effect can be used against the same target again until after the end of the third turn.

This effect breaks through [Wonder Guard]{ability}.

If the target is protected by [Protect]{move} or [Detect]{move} on the turn this move is used, this move will fail.  However, the damage on the third turn will break through protection.

The damage is applied at the end of the turn, so it ignores [Endure]{move} and [Focus Sash]{item}.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.

If the target is under the effect of [Bounce]{move}, [Fly]{move}, or [freefall]{move}, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target [flinch]{mechanic}.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used [Minimize]{move} since entering the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During [Sunny Day]{move}, the charge turn is skipped.

During [Hail]{move}, [Rain Dance]{move}, or [Sandstorm]{move}, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic} the target.

During [Rain Dance]{move}, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of [Protect]{move} and [Detect]{move}.

During [Sunny Day]{move}, this move has 50% accuracy.

short_effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  No effect otherwise.
effect: Does nothing.  Wild battles end immediately.

short_effect: Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has.
effect:
Inflicts [typeless]{mechanic} [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Every Pokémon in the user's party, excepting those that have fainted or have a [major status effect]{mechanic}, attacks the target.  Calculated stats are ignored; the base stats for the target and assorted attackers are used instead.  The random factor in the damage formula is not used.  [Dark]{type} Pokémon still get [STAB]{mechanic}.

This effect breaks through [Wonder Guard]{ability}.

short_effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, [Gust]{move}, [Sky Uppercut]{move}, [Thunder]{move}, [Twister]{move}, and [Whirlwind]{move} still hit the user normally.  [Gust]{move} and [Twister]{move} also have double power against the user.

The damage from [Hail]{move} and [Sandstorm]{move} still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of [Lock-On]{move}, [Mind Reader]{move}, or [No Guard]{ability}.

This move cannot be used while [Gravity]{move} is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Raises user's Defense by one stage.
effect:
Raises user's [Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

After this move is used, the power of [Ice Ball]{move} and [Rollout]{move} are doubled until the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.  Causes the target to flinch.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Causes the target to flinch.  Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Forced to use this move for several turns.  Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random.  All Pokémon on the [field]{mechanic} wake up, and none can fall to [sleep]{mechanic} until the lock-in ends.

Pokémon cannot use [Rest]{move} during this effect.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Stores energy up to three times for use with Spit Up and Swallow.
effect:
Raises the user's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.  Stores energy for use with [Spit Up]{move} and [Swallow]{move}.  Up to three levels of energy can be stored, and all are lost if the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.  Energy is still stored even if the stat boosts cannot be applied.

If the user uses [Baton Pass]{move}, the stat boosts are passed as normal, but the stored energy is not.

short_effect: Power is 100 times the amount of energy Stockpiled.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power is equal to 100 times the amount of energy stored by [Stockpile]{move}.  Ignores the random factor in the damage formula.  Stored energy is consumed, and the user's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} are reset to what they would be if [Stockpile]{move} had not been used.  If the user has no energy stored, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: Recovers 1/4 HP after one Stockpile, 1/2 HP after two Stockpiles, or full HP after three Stockpiles.
effect: Heals the user depending on the amount of energy stored by [Stockpile]{move}: 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic} after one use, 1/2 its max [HP]{mechanic} after two uses, or fully after three uses.  Stored energy is consumed, and the user's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} are reset to what they would be if [Stockpile]{move} had not been used.  If the user has no energy stored, this move will fail.

short_effect: Changes the weather to a hailstorm for five turns.
effect:
Changes the weather to hail for five turns, during which non-[Ice]{type} Pokémon are damaged for 1/16 their max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of every turn.

If the user is holding [Icy Rock]{item}, this effect lasts for eight turns.

[Blizzard]{move} has 100% accuracy.  If the target has used [Detect]{move} or [Protect]{move}, [Blizzard]{move} has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

[Moonlight]{move}, [Morning Sun]{move}, and [Synthesis]{move} heal only 1/4 of the user's max [HP]{mechanic}.

Pokémon with [Snow Cloak]{ability} are exempt from this effect's damage.

short_effect: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row.
effect:
Prevents the target from attempting to use the same move twice in a row.  When the target leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

If the target is forced to attempt a repeated move due to [Choice Band]{item}, [Choice Scarf]{item}, [Choice Specs]{item}, [Disable]{move}, [Encore]{move}, [Taunt]{move}, only having [PP]{mechanic} remaining for one move, or any other effect, the target will use [Struggle]{move} instead.  The target is then free to use the forced move next turn, as it didn't use that move this turn.

short_effect: Raises the target's Special Attack by one stage and confuses the target.
effect: Raises the target's [Special Attack]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}, then [confuses]{mechanic} it.

short_effect: Burns the target.
effect: [Burns]{mechanic} the target.

short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.  User faints.
effect: Lowers the target's [Attack]{mechanic} and [Special Attack]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.  User faints.

short_effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the user is [burned]{mechanic}, [paralyzed]{mechanic}, or [poisoned]{mechanic}, this move has double power.

short_effect: If the user takes damage before attacking, the attack is canceled.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the user takes damage this turn before hitting, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move}, [Metronome]{move}, or [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the user is [paralyzed]{mechanic}, this move has double power, and the user is cured of its [paralysis]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn.
effect:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the [field]{mechanic} use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over [Lightningrod]{ability} and [Storm Drain]{ability}.

If the user's ally [switches out]{mechanic}, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with [Pursuit]{move}.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Uses a move which depends upon the terrain.
Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
effect: Raises the user's [Special Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.  If the user uses an [Electric]{type} move next turn, its power will be doubled.

short_effect: For the next few turns, the target can only use damaging moves.
effect:
Target is forced to only use damaging moves for the next 3–5 turns, selected at random.  Moves that select other moves not known in advance do not count as damaging.

[Assist]{move}, [Copycat]{move}, [Me First]{move}, [Metronome]{move}, [Mirror Move]{move}, and [Sleep Talk]{move} do not directly inflict damage and thus may not be used.

[Bide]{move}, [Counter]{move}, [Endeavor]{move}, [Metal Burst]{move}, and [Mirror Coat]{move} are allowed.

short_effect: Ally's next move inflicts half more damage.
effect:
Boosts the power of the target's moves by 50% until the end of this turn.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: User and target swap items.
effect:
User and target permanently swap [held item]{mechanic}s.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has [Multitype]{ability} or [Sticky Hold]{ability}, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining [Choice Band]{item}, [Choice Scarf]{item}, or [Choice Specs]{item}, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with [Recycle]{move}.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Copies the target's ability.
effect:
User's ability is replaced with the target's until the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.  Ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.

If the target has [Wonder Guard]{ability}, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
effect: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max [HP]{mechanic}.  If the user is [switched out]{mechanic}, its replacement will be healed instead.  If the user [faint]{mechanic}s or is forcefully switched by [Roar]{move} or [Whirlwind]{move}, this effect will not activate.

short_effect: Randomly selects and uses one of the trainer's other Pokémon's moves.
effect:
Uses a move from another Pokémon in the user's party, both selected at random.  Moves from fainted Pokémon can be used.  If there are no eligible Pokémon or moves, this move will fail.

This move will not select [Assist]{move}, [Chatter]{move}, [Copycat]{move}, [Counter]{move}, [Covet]{move}, [Destiny Bond]{move}, [Detect]{move}, [dragon tail]{move}, [Endure]{move}, [fast guard]{move}, [Feint]{move}, [Focus Punch]{move}, [Follow Me]{move}, [Helping Hand]{move}, [Me First]{move}, [Metronome]{move}, [Mimic]{move}, [Mirror Coat]{move}, [Mirror Move]{move}, [overhead toss]{move}, [Protect]{move}, [Sketch]{move}, [Sleep Talk]{move}, [Snatch]{move}, [Struggle]{move}, [Switcheroo]{move}, [Thief]{move}, [Trick]{move}, or [wide guard]{move}.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Metronome]{move} or [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Prevents the user from leaving battle.  User regains 1/16 of its max HP every turn.
effect:
Prevents the user from [switching out]{mechanic}.  User regains 1/16 of its max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of every turn.  If the user was immune to [Ground]{type} attacks, it will now take normal damage from them.

[Roar]{move} and [Whirlwind]{move} will not affect the user.  The user cannot use [Magnet Rise]{move}.

The user may still use [U-turn]{move} to leave the [field]{mechanic}.

This effect can be passed with [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}, then lowers the user's [Attack]{mechanic} and [Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Reflects back the first effect move used on the user this turn.
effect:
The first non-damaging move targeting the user this turn that inflicts [major status effect]{mechanic}s, [stat change]{mechanic}s, or [trap]{mechanic}ping effects will be reflected at its user.

[Defog]{move}, [Memento]{move}, and [Teeter Dance]{move} are not reflected.

[Attract]{move}, [Flatter]{move}, [Gastro Acid]{move}, [Leech Seed]{move}, [Swagger]{move}, [Worry Seed]{move}, and [Yawn]{move} are reflected.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: User recovers the item it last used up.
effect:
User recovers the last item consumed by the user or a Pokémon in its position on the [field]{mechanic}.  The item must be used again before it can be recovered by this move again.  If the user is holding an item, this move fails.

Items taken or given away by [Covet]{move}, [Knock Off]{move}, [Switcheroo]{move}, [Thief]{move}, or [Trick]{move} may not be recovered.

short_effect: Inflicts double damage if the user takes damage before attacking this turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

[Pain Split]{move} does not count as damaging the user.

short_effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.
effect: Destroys any [Light Screen]{move} or [Reflect]{move} on the target's side of the [field]{mechanic}, then inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  The barriers are destroyed even if this move has [no effect]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Target sleeps at the end of the next turn.
effect:
Puts the target to [sleep]{mechanic} at the end of the next turn.  Ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.  If the target leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect is canceled.  If the target has a status effect when this move is used, this move will fail.

If the target is protected by [Safeguard]{move} when this move is used, this move will fail.

[Insomnia]{ability} and [Vital Spirit]{ability} prevent the [sleep]{mechanic} if the target has either at the end of the next turn, but will not cause this move to fail on use.

short_effect: Target drops its held item.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Target loses its [held item]{mechanic}.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with [Recycle]{move}.

If the target has [Multitype]{ability} or [Sticky Hold]{ability}, it will take damage but not lose its item.

short_effect: Lowers the target's HP to equal the user's.
effect: Inflicts exactly enough damage to lower the target's [HP]{mechanic} to equal the user's.  If the target's [HP]{mechanic} is not higher than the user's, this move has no effect.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.  This effect counts as damage for moves that respond to damage.

short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power increases with the user's remaining [HP]{mechanic} and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full [HP]{mechanic}.

short_effect: User and target swap abilities.
effect:
User and target switch abilities.  Ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.

If either Pokémon has [Multitype]{ability} or [Wonder Guard]{ability}, this move will fail.

short_effect: Prevents the target from using any moves that the user also knows.
effect: Prevents any Pokémon on the opposing side of the [field]{mechanic} from using any move the user knows until the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.  This effect is live; if the user obtains new moves while on the [field]{mechanic}, these moves become restricted.  If no opposing Pokémon knows any of the user's moves when this move is used, this move will fail.

short_effect: Cleanses the user of a burn, paralysis, or poison.
effect: Removes a [burn]{mechanic}, [paralysis]{mechanic}, or [poison]{mechanic} from the user.

short_effect: When the user faints, the PP of the move that fainted it will be reduced to 0.
effect: If the user [faint]{mechanic}s before it next moves, the move that fainted it will have its [PP]{mechanic} dropped to 0.  End-of-turn damage does not trigger this effect.

short_effect: Steals the target's move, if it's self-targeted.
effect:
The next time a Pokémon uses a beneficial move on itself or itself and its ally this turn, the user of this move will steal the move and use it itself.  Moves which may be stolen by this move are identified by the "snatchable" flag.

If two Pokémon use this move on the same turn, the faster Pokémon will steal the first beneficial move, and the slower Pokémon will then steal it again—thus, only the slowest Pokémon using this move ultimately gains a stolen move's effect.

If the user steals [Psych Up]{move}, it will target the Pokémon that used [Psych Up]{move}.  If the user was the original target of [Psych Up]{move}, and the Pokémon that originally used it's affected by [Pressure]{ability}, it will only lose 1 [PP]{mechanic}.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.
User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect: Confuses the target.
effect: [Confuse]{mechanic}s all targets.

short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User's [critical hit]{mechanic} rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to [burn]{mechanic} the target.

short_effect: All damage from Electric moves is halved until the end of the battle.
effect: [Electric]{type} moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to badly poison the target.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [badly poison]{mechanic} the target.

short_effect: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather's type.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move.

short_effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}, then lowers the user's [Special Attack]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage.
effect: Lowers the target's [Attack]{mechanic} and [Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.

This move can hit targets under the effect of [Bounce]{move}, [Fly]{move}, or [freefall]{move}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Defense by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic} and [Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User's [critical hit]{mechanic} rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to [poison]{mechanic} the target.

short_effect: All damage from Fire moves is halved until the end of the battle.
effect: [Fire]{type} moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Special Attack]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic} and [Speed]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: User's type changes to match the terrain.
Heals the user by half its max HP.
effect: Heals the user for half its max [HP]{mechanic}.  If the user is [Flying]{type}, its [Flying]{type} type is ignored until the end of this turn.

short_effect: Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns.
effect:
For five turns (including this one), all immunities to [Ground]{type} moves are disabled.  For the duration of this effect, the [evasion]{mechanic} of every Pokémon on the field is lowered by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

Specifically, [Flying]{type} Pokémon and those with [Levitate]{ability} or that have used [Magnet Rise]{move} are no longer immune to [Ground]{type} attacks, [Arena Trap]{ability}, [Spikes]{move}, or [Toxic Spikes]{move}.

[Bounce]{move}, [Fly]{move}, [freefall]{move}, [Hi Jump Kick]{move}, [Jump Kick]{move}, and [Splash]{move} cannot be used while this move is in effect.

short_effect: Forces the target to have no evasion, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it's Dark.
effect: Resets the target's [evasion]{mechanic} to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the [field]{mechanic}.  A [Dark]{type} Pokémon under this effect takes normal damage from [Psychic]{type} moves.  This move itself ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.

short_effect: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target is [sleep]{mechanic}ing, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect: Lowers user's Speed by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}, then lowers the user's [Speed]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power increases with the target's current [Speed]{mechanic} compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.

short_effect: User faints.  Its replacement has its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed.
effect: User faints.  Its replacement's [HP]{mechanic} is fully restored, and any [major status effect]{mechanic} is removed.  If the replacement Pokémon is immediately fainted by a switch-in effect, the next replacement is healed by this move instead.

short_effect: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target has less than half its max [HP]{mechanic} remaining, this move has double power.

short_effect: Power and type depend on the held berry.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power and type are determined by the user's held berry.  The berry is consumed.  If the user is not holding a berry, this move will fail.

short_effect: Only works if the target uses Protect or Detect on this turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Removes the effect of [Detect]{move} or [Protect]{move} from the target until the end of this turn.  If the target is not currently protected by either of these moves, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a [Jaboca Berry]{item} or [Rowap Berry]{item}, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is [super effective]{mechanic} and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

short_effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
effect: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the [field]{mechanic} have their original [Speed]{mechanic} doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Raises one of a friendly Pokémon's stats at random by two stages.
effect:
Raises one of the target's stats by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.  The raised stat is chosen at random from any stats that can be raised by two stages.  If no stat is eligible, this move will fail.

If the target has a [Substitute]{move}, this move will have no effect, even if the user is the target.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}.

short_effect: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with double the damage.
effect: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts twice the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will [fail]{mechanic}.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

short_effect: User must switch out after attacking.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}, then the user immediately [switches out]{mechanic}, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target [faint]{mechanic}s from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not [switch out]{mechanic}.

The user may be hit by [Pursuit]{move} when it [switches out]{mechanic}, if it has been targeted and [Pursuit]{move} has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of [Ingrain]{move}.  [Ingrain]{move}'s effect will end.

short_effect: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}, then lowers the user's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target uses a move or [switches out]{mechanic} this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect: Target cannot use held items.
effect:
Target cannot use its held item for five turns.  If the target leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

If a Pokémon under this effect uses [Bug Bite]{move} or [Pluck]{move} on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used.  If a Pokémon under this effect uses [Fling]{move}, it will fail.

This effect is passed by [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: Throws held item at the target; power depends on the item.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power and type are determined by the user's [held item]{mechanic}.  The item is consumed.  If the user is not holding an item, or its item has no set type and power, this move will fail.

This move ignores [Sticky Hold]{ability}.

If the user is under the effect of [Embargo]{move}, this move will fail.

short_effect: Transfers the user's major status effect to the target.
effect: If the user has a [major status effect]{mechanic} and the target does not, the user's status is transferred to the target.

short_effect: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power is determined by the [PP]{mechanic} remaining for this move, after its [PP]{mechanic} cost is deducted.  Ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.

PP remaining | Power
------------ | ----:
4 or more    |    40
3            |    50
2            |    60
1            |    80
0            |   200

If this move is activated by another move, the activating move's [PP]{mechanic} is used to calculate power.

short_effect: Prevents target from restoring its HP for five turns.
effect: For the next five turns, the target may not use any moves that only restore [HP]{mechanic}, and move effects that heal the target are disabled.  Moves that steal [HP]{mechanic} may still be used, but will only inflict damage and not heal the target.

short_effect: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 110 power.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining [HP]{mechanic}, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

short_effect: User swaps Attack and Defense.
effect:
The user's original [Attack]{mechanic} and [Defense]{mechanic} are swapped.

This effect is passed on by [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: Nullifies target's ability until it leaves battle.
effect:
The target's ability is disabled as long as it remains on the [field]{mechanic}.

This effect is passed on by [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: Prevents the target from scoring critical hits for five turns.
effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score [critical hits]{mechanic:critical hit}.

short_effect: Uses the target's move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.
effect:
If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power.

If the target moves before the user, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move}, [Metronome]{move}, or [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Uses the target's last used move.
effect:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself.

This move cannot be copied by [Mirror Move]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move}, [Metronome]{move}, or [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: User swaps Attack and Special Attack changes with the target.
effect: User swaps its [Attack]{mechanic} and [Special Attack]{mechanic} [stat modifiers]{mechanic} modifiers with the target.

short_effect: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.
effect: User swaps its [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} modifiers with the target.

short_effect: Power increases against targets with more raised stats, up to a maximum of 200.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Power starts at 60 and is increased by 20 for every [stage]{mechanic} any of the target's stats has been raised, capping at 200.  [Accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers do not increase this move's power.

short_effect: Can only be used after all of the user's other moves have been used.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  This move can only be used if each of the user's other moves has been used at least once since the user entered the [field]{mechanic}.  If this is the user's only move, this move will fail.

short_effect: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.
effect:
Changes the target's ability to [Insomnia]{ability}.

If the target's ability is [Truant]{ability} or [Multitype]{ability}, this move will fail.

short_effect: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by [Iron Fist]{ability}.

short_effect: Scatters poisoned spikes, poisoning opposing Pokémon that switch in.
effect:
Scatters poisoned spikes around the opposing [field]{mechanic}, which [poison]{mechanic} opposing Pokémon that enter the [field]{mechanic}.  A second layer of these spikes may be laid down, in which case Pokémon will be [badly poison]{mechanic}ed instead.  Pokémon immune to either [Ground]{type} moves or being [poison]{mechanic}ed are immune to this effect.  Pokémon otherwise immune to [Ground]{type} moves are affected during [Gravity]{move}.

If a [Poison]{type} Pokémon not immune to [Ground]{type} moves enters a [field]{mechanic} covered with poisoned spikes, the spikes are removed.

[Rapid Spin]{move} will remove this effect from its user's side of the [field]{mechanic}.  [Defog]{move} will remove this effect from its target's side of the [field]{mechanic}.

This move does not trigger [Synchronize]{ability}, unless the Pokémon with [Synchronize]{ability} was forced to enter the [field]{mechanic} by another effect such as [Roar]{move}.

Pokémon entering the [field]{mechanic} due to [Baton Pass]{move} are not affected by this effect.

short_effect: User and target swap stat changes.
effect: User swaps its [stat modifiers]{mechanic} with the target.

short_effect: Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.
effect:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max [HP]{mechanic} at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.
effect:
For five turns, the user is immune to [Ground]{type} moves.

If the user is under the effect of [Ingrain]{move} or has [Levitate]{ability}, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during [Gravity]{move}.

This effect is passed on by [Baton Pass]{move}.

short_effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [burn]{mechanic} the target.  [Frozen]{mechanic} Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect: User takes 1/4 its max HP in recoil.
effect:
Inflicts [typeless]{mechanic} [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User takes 1/4 its max [HP]{mechanic} in recoil.  Ignores [accuracy]{mechanic} and [evasion]{mechanic} modifiers.

This move is used automatically when a Pokémon cannot use any other move legally, e.g., due to having no [PP]{mechanic} remaining or being under the effect of both [Encore]{move} and [Torment]{move} at the same time

This move cannot be copied by [Mimic]{move}, [Mirror Move]{move}, or [Sketch]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}, nor forced by [Encore]{move}.

short_effect: User dives underwater, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User dives underwater for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, [Low Kick]{move}, [Surf]{move}, and [Whirlpool]{move} still hit the user normally.  [Surf]{move} and [Whirlpool]{move} also have double power against the user.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of [Lock-On]{move}, [Mind Reader]{move}, or [No Guard]{ability}.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, [Earthquake]{move}, [Fissure]{move}, and [Magnitude]{move} still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of [Lock-On]{move}, [Mind Reader]{move}, or [No Guard]{ability}.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.

If the target is in the first turn of [Dive]{move}, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Removes field effects from the enemy field.
effect:
Lowers the target's [evasion]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of [Mist]{move}, [Light Screen]{move}, [Reflect]{move}, [Safeguard]{move}, [Spikes]{move}, [Stealth Rock]{move}, and [Toxic Spikes]{move} from the target's side of the [field]{mechanic}.

If the target is protected by [Mist]{move}, it will prevent the [evasion]{mechanic} change, then be removed by this move.

short_effect: For five turns, slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.
effect:
For five turns (including this one), slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.  Move priority is not affected.  Using this move when its effect is already active will end the effect.

Pokémon holding [Full Incense]{item}, [Lagging Tail]{item}, or [Quick Claw]{item} and Pokémon with [Stall]{ability} ignore this effect.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [freeze]{mechanic} the target.

During [Hail]{move}, this move has 100% accuracy.  It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of [Protect]{move} and [Detect]{move}.

short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the [field]{mechanic}, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

If the target is in the first turn of [Dive]{move}, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic} the target.

short_effect: User bounces high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User bounces high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic} the target.

During the immune turn, [Gust]{move}, [Sky Uppercut]{move}, [Thunder]{move}, and [Twister]{move} still hit the user normally.  [Gust]{move} and [Twister]{move} also have double power against the user.

The damage from [Hail]{move} and [Sandstorm]{move} still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of [Lock-On]{move}, [Mind Reader]{move}, or [No Guard]{ability}.

This move cannot be used while [Gravity]{move} is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.
effect: Lowers the target's [Special Attack]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

short_effect: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
effect:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing [field]{mechanic}, damaging any Pokémon that enters the [field]{mechanic} for 1/8 its max [HP]{mechanic}.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to [Rock]{type} moves.

[Rapid Spin]{move} removes this effect from its user's side of the [field]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to [confuse]{mechanic} the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of [confusion]{mechanic}.  If the user is not a [Chatot]{pokemon}, this move will not cause [confusion]{mechanic}.

This move cannot be copied by [Mimic]{move}, [Mirror Move]{move}, or [Sketch]{move}, nor selected by [Assist]{move}, [Metronome]{move}, or [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: If the user is holding a plate, the damage inflicted will match it.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the user is holding a plate, this move's type is the type corresponding to the plate.

short_effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
effect: User [faint]{mechanic}s.  Its replacement's [HP]{mechanic} and [PP]{mechanic} are fully restored, and any [major status effect]{mechanic} is removed.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's [Special Defense]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

short_effect: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Works against Protect and Detect.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move breaks through [Detect]{move} and [Protect]{move}.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [burn]{mechanic} the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target [flinch]{mechanic}.

This move breaks through [Wonder Guard]{ability} in Generation IV.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to freeze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [freeze]{mechanic} the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target [flinch]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target and a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [paralyze]{mechanic} the target and a separate $effect_chance% chance to make the target [flinch]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's [Special Attack]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic} and [accuracy]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
effect:
Moves with multiple targets will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used [Detect]{move}, [Endure]{move}, [fast guard]{move}, [Protect]{move}, or [wide guard]{move} on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
effect: Averages the user's unmodified [Defense]{mechanic} with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified [Special Defense]{mechanic} is averaged the same way.

short_effect: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.
effect:
Averages the user's unmodified [Attack]{mechanic} with the target's unmodified Attack; the value becomes the unmodified Attack for both Pokémon. Unmodified [Special Attack]{mechanic} is averaged the same way.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as [Flower Gift]{ability} during [Sunny Day]{move}.

short_effect: All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
effect: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} are swapped.

short_effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's [Defense]{mechanic}, regardless of this move's damage class.

short_effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is [poisoned]{mechanic}, this move has double power.

short_effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight.
effect: Raises the user's [Speed]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.  Halves the user's weight; this effect does not stack.

short_effect: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
effect:
For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% [accuracy]{mechanic}, but the target is immune to [Ground]{type} damage.  Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect.

This effect is removed by [Gravity]{move}.  If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.

short_effect: Negates held items for five turns.
effect: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

short_effect: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{move}.  Removes the target's [immunity]{mechanic:immune} to [Ground]{mechanic} damage.  This effect removes any existing Ground immunity due to [Levitate]{ability}, [Magnet Rise]{move}, or [Telekinesis]{move}, and causes the target's [Flying]{type} type to be ignored when it takes Ground damage.

If the target isn't immune to Ground damage, this move will fail.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of [Bounce]{move}, [Fly]{move}, or [freefall]{move}, and ends the effect of Bounce or Fly.

short_effect: Always scores a critical hit.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a [critical hit]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max [HP]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
effect: Raises the user's [Special Attack]{mechanic}, [Special Defense]{mechanic}, and [Speed]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120

short_effect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

short_effect: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  The greater the user's [Speed]{mechanic} compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150

short_effect: Changes the target's type to Water.
effect: Changes the target to pure [Water]{type}-type until it leaves the field.  If the target has [Multitype]{ability}, this move will fail.

short_effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Raises the user's [Speed]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Lowers the target's [Special Defense]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

short_effect: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.

short_effect: Changes the target's ability to Simple.
effect: Changes the target's ability to [Simple]{ability}.

short_effect: Copies the user's ability onto the target.
effect: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

short_effect: Makes the target act next this turn.
effect:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of [Speed]{mechanic} or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If [a capella]{move} has already been used this turn, this move's power is doubled.  After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of [Speed]{mechanic} or priority.  Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.

short_effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.

short_effect: Ignores the target's stat modifiers.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage].  Damage calculation ignores the target's [stat modifiers]{mechanic}, including [evasion]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Removes all of the target's stat modifiers.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  All of the target's [stat modifiers]{mechanic} are reset to zero.

short_effect: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every [stage]{mechanic} any of the user's stats have been raised.  [Accuracy]{mechanic}, [evasion]{mechanic}, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.

short_effect: Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
effect:
Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used [Detect]{move}, [Endure]{move}, [fast guard]{move}, [Protect]{move}, or [wide guard]{move} on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by [Assist]{move} or [Metronome]{move}.

short_effect: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
effect: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.

short_effect: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic}, [Special Attack]{mechanic}, and [Speed]{mechanic} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage} each.  Lowers the user's [Defense]{mechanic} and [Special Defense]{mechanic} by one stage each.

short_effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
effect: Heals the target for half its max [HP]{mechanic}.

short_effect: Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage].  If the target has a [major status ailment]{mechanic}, this move has double power.

short_effect: Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  User carries the target high into the air for one turn, during which no moves will hit either Pokémon and neither can act.  On the following turn, the user drops the target, inflicting damage and ending the effect.
If the target is [Flying]{type}-type, this move will function as normal but inflict no damage.
[Gust]{move}, [knock down]{move}, [Sky Uppercut]{move}, [Thunder]{move}, [Twister]{move}, and [Whirlwind]{move} can hit both the user and the target during this effect.  [Gust]{move} and [Twister]{move} will additionally have double power.

The damage from [Hail]{move} and [Sandstorm]{move} still applies during this effect.

Either Pokémon may be hit during this effect if also under the effect of [Lock-On]{move}, [Mind Reader]{move}, or [No Guard]{ability}.

This move cannot be used while [Gravity]{move} is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by [Sleep Talk]{move}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} and its [Speed]{mechanic} by two stages.

short_effect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}, then [switches]{mechanic:switch out} the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of [Ingrain]{move} or [Suction Cups]{ability}, or it has a [Substitute]{move}, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.

short_effect: Destroys the target's held berry.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the target is [holding]{mechanic:held item} a [berry]{mechanic}, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.

short_effect: Makes the target act last this turn.
effect: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of [Speed]{mechanic} or move [priority]{mechanic}.  If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic} and [Special Attack]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.  During [Sunny Day]{move}, raises both stats by two stages.

short_effect: Has double power if the user has no held item.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If the user has no [held item]{mechanic}, this move has double power.

short_effect: User becomes the target's type.
effect: User's type changes to match the target's.

short_effect: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage].  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining [HP]{mechanic}.  User faints.

short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by three stages.
effect: Raises the user's [Special Attack]{mechanic} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack]{mechanic}, [Defense]{mechanic}, and [accuracy]{mechanic} by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Gives the user's held item to the target.
effect: Transfers the user's [held item]{mechanic} to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.

short_effect: With grass realm, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If a friendly Pokémon used [grass realm]{move} earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved [Speed]{mechanic} for four turns (including this one).

short_effect: With water realm, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon's moves for four turns.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If a friendly Pokémon used [water realm]{move} earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

short_effect: With fire realm, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
effect: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic}.  If a friendly Pokémon used [fire realm]{move} earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic} in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).

short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
effect: Raises the user's [Attack] and [Special Attack] by one [stage]{mechanic} each.

short_effect: Raises the user's Defense by three stages.
effect: Raises the user's [Defense]{mechanic} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to put the target to sleep.
effect:
Inflicts [regular damage].  Has a $effect_chance% chance to put the target to [sleep]{mechanic}.
If the user is a [meroetta]{pokemon}, it will toggle between Voice and Step form.

short_effect: Lowers the target's Speed.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Speed.

short_effect: Charges for a turn before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

short_effect: Charges for a turn before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

short_effect: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage.

short_effect: If the target knows cross thunder, it must use it this turn, and both moves inflict more damage.
effect: Forces the target to use cross thunder if possible.

short_effect: If the target knows cross flame, it must use it this turn, and both moves inflict more damage.
effect: Forces the target to use cross flame if possible.

short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.
